title: Meaningful data for data wrangling
text: basic example shows download data amd use se function package includes 2 datasets one function now. dataset containing monthly average zooplankton biomass 2007 2021 dataset containing monthly average phytoplankton biomass 2007 2021 se function calculate standard error
code: library(PlanktonData) ## data(zooplankton) ## data(phytoplankton)  ## se(c(1,4,1,2,5,1,2)) head(zooplankton) #>   Month_abb Year Station       Coordinates    Group        Taxa   Biomass #> 1       Jan 2009    BY15 20.05000/57.33333 Copepoda     Acartia  6.650319 #> 2       Jan 2009    BY31 18.23333/58.58812 Copepoda     Acartia  1.816994 #> 3       Jan 2009     BY5 15.98333/55.25000 Copepoda     Acartia  5.562097 #> 4       Jan 2009    BY15 20.05000/57.33333 Copepoda Centropages  5.738561 #> 5       Jan 2009    BY31 18.23333/58.58812 Copepoda Centropages  1.228759 #> 6       Jan 2009     BY5 15.98333/55.25000 Copepoda Centropages 14.405224 head(phytoplankton) #>   Month_abb Year Station       Coordinates            Taxa   Biomass #> 1       Jan 2007    BY15 20.05000/57.33333   Cyanobacteria 1.4170670 #> 2       Jan 2007    BY15 20.05000/57.33333         Diatoms 1.7625112 #> 3       Jan 2007    BY31 18.23333/58.58812         Diatoms 0.1557741 #> 4       Jan 2007     BY5 15.98333/55.25000         Diatoms 1.6393078 #> 5       Jan 2007    BY15 20.05000/57.33333 Dinoflagellates 0.6395350 #> 6       Jan 2007    BY31 18.23333/58.58812 Dinoflagellates 0.0588896
